settings.mi_text:
Photos without slider
one under another

settings.question: How much is delivery and how long does it take?
settings.answer: Delivery is calculated based on the weight of what you are ordering and where you would like your order shipped to. You can view our full shipping information and tariff by clicking on the shipping estimator in the shopping basket. Alternatively, you can add your required products into your shopping cart and click on the ‘calculate shipping’ button which will tell you how much we will charge you for delivery.

settings.question: What will happen if I am not at home to receive my parcel / Will my parcel need to be signed for?
settings.answer: This depends on which shipping method you chose when you checked out. If you chose the standard postal service and the item does not fit through your letterbox, the postman will most likely take your parcel to your local post office or sorting office. If you chose the courier service, the driver may leave your parcel with a neighbour or it may be taken to your local post office. In either case, the driver should put a card through your letterbox telling you what he has done with your parcel.

settings.question: Do the miniatures come with the gift box that is shown in the product photo?
settings.answer: If the product is shown with a gift box or gift tube, the product is sold with the box / tube. If for any reason, the box / tube is not available, there will be a message within the product details stating this.

settings.question: Do the prices shown on your website include VAT?
settings.answer: Yes, all of the prices quoted on this website are inclusive of VAT at the current rate.

settings.question: I’ve just placed my order but can I add something on?
settings.answer: In many cases, yes you can. If we have not yet shipped your order, please telephone us on one of the numbers detailed on our Contact Us page and we will be able to assist you.

settings.question: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: At this time, we do not ship outside of the UK.

settings.question: Do you have a catalogue?
settings.answer: Just Miniatures is an online business and therefore our entire catalogue can be found online. We do not publish a printed (paper) catalogue.

settings.question: What happens if my parcel is damaged?
settings.answer: If your parcel is damaged, please let us know as soon as possible using one of the methods detailed on our Contact Us page. We will organise for your damaged consignment (or part thereof) to be collected and a fresh consignment to be shipped.

settings.question: I need my order urgently is this possible?
settings.answer: In many cases the answer is yes! We urge you to telephone us on one of the numbers detailed on our Contact Us page and if your required products are in stock, we may well be able to deliver the same day or the following day (subject to carriage charges).

settings.question: How do I make a complaint?
settings.answer: Whilst we do get it right most of the time, there are occasions when something goes wrong. If this is the case, please let us know by contacting us using one of the methods detailed on our Contact Us page. We will ask you for the details of the problem and tell you how we can help.

settings.question: How do I send my picture to you for Personalised items?
settings.answer: Certain personalised label designs include a photo that we require emailing / sending to us. Please email it to designer@justminiatures.co.uk with your order number in the subject line. If you only have a hard (printed) version and are happy to send it to is, please use our postal address as detailed on our Contact Us page. We will return the photo with your order.

settings.question: Can you personalise branded products?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, we are not able to personalise any of the branded products that we sell (e.g. Jack Daniels, Baileys etc). but we do supply a number of assorted personalised products each containing a quality drink. These items start life in an unlabelled bottle. The current list is Single Malt Whisky, Blended Whisky, Vodka, Gin, Red Wine, White Wine, Rosé Wine and Prosecco.

settings.question: Can I design my own artwork?
settings.answer: Yes you can design your own artwork but we recommend that you get in touch with us first using our Contact Us details so that we can send you our guidelines.

settings.question: Can you produce my personalised order urgently?
settings.answer: Sometimes yes! Contact Us by telephone and we will do our utmost to help you.

settings.question: Can I return my unwanted order?
settings.answer: We are very sorry but unless there is a problem with the order we are unable to accept the return of personalised items.

settings.question: How do I cancel my order?
settings.answer: You can cancel a personalised item only before the items have been produced.

settings.question: Can I see a proof of my label design?
settings.answer: If you require a proof of the label design, please specify so using the special instructions box during checkout.

settings.html_content:
Customer Reviews

Trustpilot

settings.testi_desc: Welcome to the UK's leading supplier of alcohol miniature bottle drinks online. We have a massive range of mini alcoholic beverage bottles with all the famous alcohol drinks brands and thousands more alcoholic miniatures that you may not have heard of.
With an ever-expanding range and our new Premium Gifts and Personalised Glasses and Bottles, we are sure we will have the perfect items for you and your friends!

Just Miniatures is the UK's Largest Retailer of Miniature Alcohol Bottles, with Amazing Prices and a Great Range. With Over 15 Years in the Business, we strive on customer service and quick delivery.

Having supplied everyone from the Royal Family to A List Celebrities, Just Miniatures has the pedigree and experience to provide a bespoke service, whether it be for personalised gift boxes and bottles, or bulk orders for Wholesale.

Having supplied everyone from the Royal Family to A List Celebrities, Just Miniatures has the pedigree and experience to provide a bespoke service, whether it be for personalised gift boxes and bottles, or bulk orders for Wholesale.

Today, Just Miniatures is known throughout the drinks industry as the only outlet for alcohol miniatures in both retail and wholesale markets and currently operates from a dedicated warehouse and office facility in the rural market town of Hadleigh, Suffolk.
The highly dedicated team of staff continues to grow and each and every member has the same vision and focus as the next with 100% customer satisfaction the utmost priority.

settings.html_content: Spirits, liqueurs, Wines, Soft Drinks, Gifts & Personalised Miniatures
